metadata.name: Gork
metadata.description:
There's no greater friend to an adventurer than a good piece of armor! 
"This work belongs to #Dart2121 exhibition. From the 23rd of November 2021 to the 6th of February 2022, Milan - Dart Museum - Permanente di Milano - Wrong Theory".
Gork, the protagonist of the series, belongs to the warrior race of orcs, endowed with a natural talent for weapons and combat, and animated by ferocity and courage that allows them to dash into battle without fear or remorse. They are also loyal and proud beings, proud of their military lifestyle. // Artwork size : 2160 x 3840 pixels, Polysketch and VR technique.
